name: Pricilla
comment: I love the Dawg Haus! They helped me learn how to be the best caretaker. When I met Lulu, a rescue from Dawg Haus, I knew she was the one!

name: Jorge
comment: I adopted Buster through Dawg Haus. Simple process and friendly people.

name: Christopher
comment: I volunteer here! It is a great atmosphere and the dogs are adorable. They even have a senior spa day for the older dogs.

name: Peter
comment: I adopted Rufio through Dawg Haus and loved the process. They made me feel valued and taken care of.
